name: Exp7_OmniglotNoSepPlast_alpha_free_tanh_oja_lr3e-5_gamma0.666_NFS
cmdLine: export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64 &&  PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/local/nvidia/bin:/opt/hadoop/latest/bin && export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/nvidia/lib64/  &&  export LC_ALL=C.UTF-8  &&   export LANG=C.UTF-8  &&  cd /home/work/ && python3 omniglot.py --nbclasses 5  --nbiter 5000000 --rule oja --activ tanh --steplr 1000000 --prestime 1 --prestimetest 1 --gamma .666 --alpha free --lr 3e-5 --rngseed {{mesos.instance}}
